title: Intermediate Collaborative Problem-Based Building Energy Simulation Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational thermodynamics and energy management concepts, along with basic software proficiency
context.additional_context: Mobile device provision per learner, with cloud-accessible simulation software environment

learning_goals: Learners can generate daily/nightly thermal load analysis reports using building energy simulation software.
Learners can propose three or more integrated energy-saving solutions by collaborating with team members in a CPBL environment.
Learners can explain energy correlations between building envelopes, HVAC systems, and renewable energy integration based on concept maps.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
